title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 94.2 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 94.2 - Applicability

State Regulations

This Part shall apply to every insurance company and fraternal benefit society doing business in this State and every insurance company and fraternal benefit society holding a certificate from the superintendent as being accredited for the reinsurance of life insurance, annuities or accident and health insurance. It shall apply to all individual and group accident and health insurance policies including credit disability insurance policies issued by such insurers, whether funded in the general account or in a separate account, no matter where issued or assumed, and no matter where shown in the annual statement. This Part shall also apply to certain specified accident and health benefits in life insurance policies and annuity contracts. This Part shall be applicable to such societies and insurers for all statements filed after the effective date of this Part. For the purposes of this Part, insurer shall mean such a society or insurer. Notes

94.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
